questions.question_text: Which of the following are deployment recommendations for ITSI? (Choose all that apply.)

choices.D: Deployments should use fastest possible disk arrays for indexers.
choices.B: Deployments require a dedicated ITSI search head.
choices.A: Deployments often require an increase of hardware resources above base Splunk requirements.
choices.C: Deployments may increase the number of required indexers based on the number of KPI searches.

choices.D: Backfill of a KPI should always be selected so historical data points can be used immediately and alerts based on that data can occur.
choices.C: Services, entities, and saved searches are stored in the ITSI app, while events created by KPI execution are stored in the itsi_summary index.
choices.B: Entities, entity meta-data, and entity rules should be planned carefully to support the service design and configuration.
choices.A: Service access control requirements for ITSI Team Access should be considered, and appropriate teams provisioned prior to creating the ITSI Service.

discussion.content: A + B. C incorrect (slide 215) and D optional (slide 204).
